properties.title: Log Analytics - Applying Mitigation
properties.communication:
Starting at 09:51 UTC on 18 Mar 2020 you have been identified as a customer using Log Analytics who may experience query failures and ingestion latency. Engineers are applying mitigation and some customers may be seeing signs of recovery at this time.

The next update will be provided in 60 minutes, or as events warrant.

Starting at 09:51 UTC on 18 Mar 2020 you have been identified as a customer using Log Analytics who may experience query failures and ingestion latency. Engineers are applying mitigation and some customers may be seeing signs of recovery at this time.

The next update will be provided in 60 minutes, or as events warrant.
